data.name: Email_Invite_Txt
data.value:
Hi,
I just got the awesome new hike messenger, it's faster, simpler and even more beautiful! Check out their hilarious new stickers and you'll surely never send another plain boring message!
hike also gives you the choice of Privacy with Last Seen so that you can keep you close friends closer.
Download it now http://hike.in and join the fun!

data.name: RandomText_Boy1
data.value: I haven't been this excited about Friday, since last Friday

data.name: RandomText_Boy2
data.value: Getting married before 20 is like leaving a party before 8!

data.name: RandomText_Boy3
data.value: Listen, smile, agree and do whatever the hell you were gonna do!

data.name: RandomText_Boy4
data.value: Boys speak about 2000 words a day!

data.name: RandomText_Boy5
data.value: Is there an autocorrect that works on life decisions?

data.value: Well behaved girls rarely make history

data.value: Getting married before 20 is like leaving a party before 8!

data.name: RandomText_Girl5
